metadata.title: Little Noses Decongestant Nose Drops, Gentle 1/8% Formula 0.5 fl oz (15 ml)
features: Little Remedies Decongestant Nose Drops, everything they need. Nothing they don't.
Relieves congestion due to common cold, hay fever and other upper respiratory allergies
Helps clear nasal passages; shrinks swollen membranes
Temporarily restores freer breathing through the nose. Helps decongest sinus openings and passages; temporarily relieves sinus congestion and pressur
description: Little Remedies Little Noses Decongestant Nose Drops Description. Medicated For Kids 2+ Phenylephrine Hydrochloride. Works in Seconds to Relieve Stuffy Noses. Common Cold. Nasal Congestion. Allergies. Gentle 1/8% Formula No Alcohol Temporarily relieves nasal congestion due to common cold, hay fever or other upper respiratory allergies. Helps clear nasal passages; shrinks swollen membranes. Temporarily restores freer breathing through the nose. Helps decongest sinus openings and passages; temporarily relieves sinus congestion and pressure.
